TranscoderWrapper Class Reference

Wraps an XMLTranscoder object to be used by the StrX and XStr classes. More...

 Block size used internally by the parser. Should according to xercesc documentation be in the 4 to 64k range.

 Pointer to the transcoder object.

Detailed Description

Wraps an XMLTranscoder object to be used by the StrX and XStr classes.

void TranscoderWrapper::setEncoding (  const char *  encoding,
unsigned int  maxCharSize
)  [inline, static]
 

Sets the encoding to use when transcoding strings with the StrX and XStr classes.

Parameters:
encoding The name of the encoding, for example 'ISO-8859-1'.
maxCharSize The maximum size of a character in the given encoding.
